thread.title: Dean Bouzanis confronts Besart Berisha, Melbourne Derby | The Courier-Mail
thread.title_full: Dean Bouzanis confronts Besart Berisha, Melbourne Derby | The Courier-Mail

title: Dean Bouzanis confronts Besart Berisha, Melbourne Derby | The Courier-Mail
text:
Melbourne City’s Dean Bouzanis caught on camera unleashing furious tirade at Besart Berisha Staff Writers, FOX SPORTS February 4, 2017 11:41pm 
MELBOURNE City’s Dean Bouzanis could come under scrutiny after unleashing a furious tirade at Melbourne Victory’s Besart Berisha. 
Following Victory’s controversial winning goal in the 86th minute of the Melbourne Derby, Berisha collected the ball from the net and threw it at the City goalkeeper. media_camera Dean Bouzanis and Besart Berisha. 
As referee Chris Beath deliberated with his assistant referee whether Berisha had interfered with the goal from an offside position, Bouzanis approached them — seemingly to protest the goal — and was given a yellow card. 
Just moments later, in a confrontation in the 87th minute, Bouzanis unleashed a tirade at Victory’s Berisha, which was caught on the Fox Sports cameras. 
During the rant, Bouzanis appeared to call the Albanian striker a “f***ing gypsy.” 
When the goal was awarded, Berisha reacted by getting in Bouzanis’ face with a dramatic celebration. 
The goal proved to be the decisive one in Victory’s 2-1 win over City. 
It wasn’t the pair’s first encounter — earlier in the evening, Bouzanis had saved Berisha’s penalty, with the striker later scoring the equaliser. 
WATCH THE INCIDENT IN OUR VIDEO PLAYER ABOVE.
